nodes.text: The Charge at Feather Nebula was a holodrama that was released sometime after the actual Battle of the Feather Nebula during the Galactic Empire's reconquest of the Outer Rim Territories.

The holodrama's title refers to the real-world 1953 western film The Charge at Feather River, which contains the original Wilhelm scream. In his endnotes for The Essential Guide to Warfare, Jason Fry, one of the authors of the book, implies that the holodrama also used the Wilhelm scream by saying, "If you know your Ben Burtt lore, I bet you can guess what sound is heard at least once during The Charge at Feather Nebula".
